subject: Can't find good drug store
body:
Dear valued member.
With this letter we are presenting you one of the most popular Canadian on-line drug stores. MyCanadianPharmacy is known for providing quality products at ultra low prices. 
Receive world class pharmaceutical products and pay less than you could pay for American drugs of the same quality.
Click here to get more informationhttp://termfoot.hk
Personal approach, high security level, fast and efficient service.Summer discounts are available.
Best regards,Scott Leary
